job.title: Associate Software Engineer
job.description: stronguAbout UsbrbrustrongLogicMonitor is the leading SaaSbased performance monitoring platform for enterprise ITbrbrWe love going to work and think you should too strongWe are customerobsessed work as one team and strive to be better every daystrong  These are our core values So its no surprise that we work hard and genuinely have fun working with each other to achieve great things togetherbrbrstrongWe are located in the busy technical epicenter of Cambridge MA strong We are looking for you to bring your expertise drive and passion as we expand our global presence and achieve recordbreaking successbrbrLogicMonitor is an equal opportunity employer Were committed to creating an inclusive environment for all our employees where different backgrounds and perspectives are valued and encouraged  regardless of race color religion national origin age sex marital status ancestry physical or mental disability veteran status gender identity or sexual orientation strongWe encourage all people to come as they arestrong brbrWe operate with integrity esteem diversity and treat each other fairly and with respect strongWe strive to find our own versions of personal and professional harmony through community building and holistic growthstrong We hear time and time again that our awesome people are a huge part of why LMers chose LogicMonitor love their teams and choose to staybrbrTo learn more about life at LogicMonitor check out our Careers Page brbrstronguWhat Youll DobrbrustrongThe Associate Backend Developer on the Engineering team is responsible for the implementation design architecture and quality control of business integrationsgeneral development within the customerfacing product application and internal tools used by development technical operations This includes troubleshooting bugs and implementing new features as required in existing backend applications even building new components as needed A successful Associate Backend Developer will produce all required functionality in a timely manner and will communicate and work with colleagues to solve problems and improve the systems they work withbrbrstronguHeres a Closer Look At This Key RolebrustrongulliPrioritize and plan for deliverables in an iterative development strategyliliDocument code and test technical solutions and enhancements for existing systems bringing a new perspective and a willingness to improveliliFollow agile software development methodologies for implementation liliWork with various teams in LogicMonitor to deliver software products that support LogicMonitors business growthliliConstantly work towards career growth and learning opportunities There will be a lot of technologies to absorb and we want someone who is motivated and able to learn quickly liliTroubleshoot and resolve productapplication issues for escalated support cases brliulstronguWhat Youll NeedbrustrongulliProject experience 1 year working in Java in a Linux environmentliliBS or above degree in computer science or related field liliFamiliar with latest Java development framework and opensource tools liliStrong understanding of web application architecturesliliAble to quickly develop competencies in numerous technologies learn fastliliAbility to work with a development team and develop strong reliable and effective relationships with team membersbrliul
